text: Ara amara musara matara kache anuprerana dilama e'i bale -- ''etike stan'yadana karo, tarapara yakhana tara sanbandhe asanka kara takhana take panite phele da'o, ara bhaya karo na o duhkha'o karo na. Nihsandeha amara take phiriye deba tomara kache, ara take baniye tulaba rasulaganera ekajana ka’re.’’
